title: A Short History of Scotland
creator: Andrew Lang
description: LibriVox recording of A Short History of Scotland by Andrew Lang, read by Sibella Denton. A Short History of Scotland is a concise introduction to the history of Scotland from Roman times to the last Jacobite rebellion, written by the author of a much longer Scottish history. (Summary by Sibella Denton.) For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org Download M4B(120mb)
subject: LibriVox;audio books;history;Scotland
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text

reviews.reviewbody: Well read, but not quite well enough written to get more stars.  Good, but not particularly good compared to other histories.
reviews.reviewtitle: An average history, although well read
